name: Special Topics: Art with Professor Nothi Ng
name_original: Special Topics: Art with Professor Nothi Ng
description:
We invite you to enroll in the Special Topics course covering art and taught by professor Nothi Ng. In this course you will have the freedom to explore your inner creativity and express it through art. 

This experience was built in 12 hours for Ludum Dare 45 by Saul Amster (@Blarfnip).  The theme for the game jam was "Start with Nothing". 

In this experience, you and Professor Ng will create wonderful artistic creations. You can press the save button to export your art to a PNG file. Feel free to send them to my twitter, or share them on social media!

Music by the amazing Makai Symphony
